lead_paragraph: Lawyers for James Cromitie and three other bomb-plot suspects say prodding by a government informer, Shahed Hussain, was illegal entrapment.
snippet: Lawyers for James Cromitie and three other bomb-plot suspects say prodding by a government informer, Shahed Hussain, was illegal entrapment.

headline.main: Tapes in Bomb-Plot Trial Show Suspect Wavering as an Informer Prods Him to Act
headline.seo: Tapes Show James Cromitie Wavering on Terror Plot
headline.print_headline: Tapes in Bomb-Plot Trial Show Suspect Wavering as an Informer Prods Him to Act
